definition: not to overlook, nor spare (idiom); unwilling to forgive/to treat severely without listening to excuses
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although

sentences.english: Won't you tell your dad get off my back?
sentences.chinese: 你能让你爸爸别对我不依不饶么？

sentences.english: But property companies needed to Mr Cheung proper court.
sentences.chinese: 但物业公司不依不饶，把张先生诉至法院。

sentences.english: Besides the next gift, I will importunate her for more.
sentences.chinese: 算上下一个礼物，我将对她不依不饶的要更多的礼物。

definition: to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
so angry it's unbearable/bitter about unbearable grievances
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
not to comply/not to go along with/not to let off easily/not to let sb get away with it
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
to chatter or jabber on and on
